short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Frisk-Lite is the simplest way to edit and add notes while browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Found a weblink, paragraph, contact number, or quote that you want to save in local? Frustrated by switching tab or windows to access your Notepad? With the Frisk-lite Chrome Extension, easily save text you want to look on later. Take notes for in detail and categorize your notes in 3 section.

Features:
 • Save text, and images
 • Auto Save
 • Does not sync or send any information to any other device.
 • Works Offline

Please do not save any important data/passwords or secret information in this tab. Use this as a rough notepad alongside.

**Disclaimer:**
